001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo;
002
003import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
004import androidx.room.Relation;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.RowStitch;
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the
012 * {@code stitches} associated with a particular {@link Row} instance. It is not entity, but it
013 * allows for more complicated queries without complicated SQL code.
014 */
015public class RowWithStitches {
016
017  @ColumnInfo(name = "row_id")
018  private long id;
019
020  @ColumnInfo(name = "current_stitch_id", index = true)
021  private long currentStitchId;
022
023  @ColumnInfo(name = "pattern_id", index = true)
024  private long patternId;
025
026  @Relation(entityColumn = "row_id", parentColumn = "row_id")
027  private List<RowStitch> stitches;
028
029  /**
030   * Gets the id for a particular {@link Row}.
031   */
032  public long getId() {
033    return id;
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Sets the id for a particular {@link Row}.
038   */
039  public void setId(long id) {
040    this.id = id;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Gets the currentStitchId for a particular {@link Row}
045   */
046  public long getCurrentStitchId() {
047    return currentStitchId;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Gets the currentStitchId for a particular {@link Row}.
052   */
053  public void setCurrentStitchId(long currentStitchId) {
054    this.currentStitchId = currentStitchId;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Gets the id for a particular {@link Pattern}.
059   */
060  public long getPatternId() {
061    return patternId;
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Sets the id for a particular {@link Pattern}.
066   */
067  public void setPatternId(long patternId) {
068    this.patternId = patternId;
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * This getter gets the {@link List} of stitches associated with a particular {@link Row}.
073   */
074  public List<RowStitch> getStitches() {
075    return stitches;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * This setter sets the {@link List} of stitches associates with a particular {@link Row}.
080   */
081  public void setStitches(List<RowStitch> stitches) {
082    this.stitches = stitches;
083  }
084}
